meanings.definition: People of good social standing or breeding.
meanings.sent1: The gentlefolks in town always dressed elegantly.
meanings.sent2: The gentlefolks gathered for a fancy dinner party.
meanings.sent3: The gentlefolks decided to have a friendly competition in croquet.
meanings.sent4: The gentlefolks were like graceful swans gliding through the ballroom.
meanings.sent5: The gentlefolks' impeccable manners left a lasting impression on everyone.

meanings.definition: A polite or well-mannered group of individuals.
meanings.sent1: The kind-hearted gentlefolks helped their neighbors during the storm.
meanings.sent2: The gentlefolks greeted each other with warm smiles.
meanings.sent3: The gentlefolks organized a charity event to support the local community.
meanings.sent4: The gentlefolks' politeness shone brightly in every interaction.
meanings.sent5: The gentlefolks' gentle demeanor made everyone feel welcome.
